text: today I'm sharing with you four
must-have grilling tips for the boss
whenever you're using wooden skewers you
want to make sure that you soak them for
at least thirty minutes so that the wood
does not burn on your grill the second
tip would be arranging your vegetables
your meats on their own skewers so that
they can cook evenly and then the third
tip is using two skewers during the
cooking process the hole that's created
by the kebab gets bigger so your food
starts rotating around the skewer this
is a sure way to avoid that because the
whole thing will just flip over nicely
another helpful tip for making the box
is that whatever you're grilling you
want the size to be a little bit greater
than an inch because if they're too
small they're going to fall off your
skewers so now I'm going to season these
up with a little bit of salt and pepper
and so these go right onto your oiled
grill and now you know your vegetables
will cook evenly because they're all
together your shrimp will cook evenly
because that's together and you will
have perfectly cooked and easy to flip
kebabs for your summer barbecue
